webshopId.label: Webshop-ID
webshopId.tooltipText: Die Webshop-ID, die das Plugin dazu verwendet sich mit der ratenkauf by easyCredit API zu authentifizieren.

apiPassword.label: API Passwort
apiPassword.tooltipText: Der API Key, welchen das Plugin dazu verwendet sich mit der ratenkauf by easyCredit API zu authentifizieren.

widgetEnabled.label: Show widget
widgetEnabled.tooltipText: If this option is active, the widget will be shown using the selector below.

widgetSelectorProductDetail.label: CSS selector for product detail page

settingForm.messageSaveSuccess: The ratenkauf by easyCredit settings have been saved successfully.
settingForm.messageTestSuccess: The API credentials have been successfully validated.
settingForm.messageTestError: The API credentials could not been validated.
